divs: Sighting DetailsIn the early morning of 3-17-2010 we left Amarillo taking I-40 west. Was just a beautiful day, blue sky no cloud.I was driving and my wife was taking pictures. We noticed the object in the picture the day we downloaded in our pc.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Amarillo
There was one other sighting in Amarillo on or around March 17th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: We did not notice anything till we download the picture in our PC
